AN Act To EMPOWER THE Unean COUNCIL OF THE TOWN ov GAMPAHA TO REDUCE THE PROPERTY RATE FOR THE YEARS 1951 AND 1962 IN RBSPECT OF A SPECIFIED AREA OF THE TOWN.
